description: This Kotlin class 'Repository' provides an abstraction over data sources for a media streaming app. It offers functions to fetch categories, content, search for items, get content details, and live channels. It supports fetching data from a real API endpoint configured at runtime or falling back to mock data when the API is unavailable.

classes.name: Repository
classes.description: A class that manages data fetching for categories, content items, search, and live channels, supporting both real API calls and mock data.

methods.name: getCategories
methods.description: Fetches content categories from the API or returns mock categories if API fails.

methods.name: getContents
methods.description: Fetches content items, optionally filtered by category ID, from the API or returns mock contents.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Searches for content items matching a query string, using API or mock data.

methods.name: getContentDetails
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific content item by ID, via API or mock data.

methods.name: getLiveChannels
methods.description: Fetches live TV channels from the API or returns mock channels.

methods.name: mockCategories
methods.description: Provides a list of predefined mock categories.

methods.name: mockContents
methods.description: Provides a list of mock content items with predefined data.

methods.name: mockLive
methods.description: Provides a list of mock live TV channels.
